---
title: "Course Overview"
---

The course consists of one lecture and two practical sessions per week. For the practical sessions, the group will be split into 5-6 groups of equal size. 

<br>

## Rooms and Times

```{r, echo = F, message = F, warning = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
tribble(~Class, ~Teacher, ~Time, ~Room,
        "Lectures", "Dr. Philipp Masur", "Monday  9:00am", "HG-14A00",
        "Practical Session 1", "tba", "Wednesday, 9:00 & Thursday, 13:30", "Dr. Alberto L贸pez Ortega",
        "Practical Session 2", "tba", "Wednesday, 11:00 & Thursday, 15:30", "Dr. Alberto L贸pez Ortega",
        "Practical Session 3", "tba", "Wednesday, 9:00 & Friday, 09:00", "Santiago G贸mez-Echeverry",
        "Practical Session 4", "tba", "Wednesday, 11:00 & Friday, 11:00", "Santiago G贸mez-Echeverry",
        "Practical Session 5", "tba", "Wednesday, 9:00 & Friday, 09:00", "Dr. Kasper Welbers") %>%
  kable(format = "html") %>%
  kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed", "responsive")) %>%
  kable_styling(fixed_thead = T) %>%
  column_spec(1, bold = T, width = "12em") %>%
  row_spec(0, color = "white", background = "#39423E")
```
